name: Roghill Incident
description:
Roghill Incident is an Indie storytelling/exploration/kind-of-horror game.
Explore an open world at night.
Can you find all locations, notes and hints to uncover the whole story?

More...

The playing time, if you play this game without prior knowledge, is about 90 to 120 minutes.
If the character dies, the game starts over (therefore: always be careful and cautious!).
The use of headphones is highly recommended.
